DOC.HEADLINE: COMMUNITY NEWS : LA MIRADA ; SCHOOL WINS NATIONAL AWARD FOR ITS PROGRAMS
DOC.TEXT: Gardenhill Elementary School has received a prestigious Blue_Ribbon award from the U.S. Department_of_Education . The department presents the award yearly to schools that score high during reviews of their leadership , educational_programs , community support and teaching environment . Gardenhill was one of four schools in Los Angeles County that received the award . A total 276 public and private_schools nationwide received the award this year . Gardenhill Principal Christine Reasin praised school programs that emphasize geography , international relations and democracies around the world . Norwalk-La Mirada Unified officials went_to Washington recently to accept the award and meet with President Clinton . JOHN COX
